languages.text: {n}Маражай едко смеется.{/n} "Даже перед лицом непреодолимой силы ты пытаешься вести свою партию... как трогательно. Но довольно болтовни".
{n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to hold your own even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching! But enough talk."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай едко смеется.{/n} "Даже перед лицом непреодолимой силы ты пытаешься вести свою партию... как трогательно. Но довольно болтовни".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to play the part even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching. But enough talk."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai rit d'un air caustique.{/n} « Même dans l'adversité, vous continuez à vouloir sauver la face... Comme c'est touchant ! Mais trêve de bavardages. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to hold your own even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching! But enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai rit d'un air caustique.{/n} « Même dans l'adversité, vous continuez à vouloir faire bonne figure... Comme c'est touchant ! Mais trêve de bavardages. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋讥讽地大笑起来。{/n}“即便面对势不可挡的力量，你也在努力维持你的立场……这可真让人感动！不过，话就说到这里吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to hold your own even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching! But enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋讥讽地大笑起来。{/n}“即便面对势不可挡的力量，你也在努力扮演你的角色……这可真让人感动！不过，话就说到这里吧。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは皮肉っぽく笑った。{/n}「圧倒的な力の前でも、自分を保とうとしている…なんとも感動的だな！だが、話はここまでだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to hold your own even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching! But enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは皮肉っぽく笑った。{/n}「圧倒的な力の前でも、自分を保とうとしている…なんとも感動的だな！だが、話はここまでだ」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht sarkastisch.{/n} "Ihr versucht selbst angesichts einer Übermacht standhaft zu bleiben ... Wie rührend! Aber genug der Worte."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to hold your own even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching! But enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht sarkastisch.{/n} "Ihr versucht selbst angesichts einer Übermacht bei Eurer Rolle zu bleiben ... Wie rührend! Aber genug der Worte."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai suelta una carcajada mordaz.{/n} «Intentas mantener el tipo incluso en abrumadora inferioridad... ¡Qué conmovedor! Pero ya hemos conversado bastante».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to hold your own even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching! But enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai suelta una carcajada mordaz.{/n} «Intentas mantener el tipo incluso en abrumadora inferioridad... ¡Qué conmovedor! Pero ya hemos conversado bastante».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sertçe gülüyor.{/n} "Böyle ezici bir güç karşısında bile duruşunu bozmamaya çalışıyorsun. Ne kadar da dokunaklı! Bu kadar konuşma yeter!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs caustically.{/n} "You are trying to hold your own even in the face of overwhelming force... How touching! But enough talk."
